attributes.action: sack the unelected Peter Mandelson with immediate effect and as an unelected Prime Minister call an immediate General Election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Peter Mandelson has been brought back into the present Govt. by Gordon Brown using the back door - this Govt. thinks we the people are stupid and will allow men of Mandelson's chequered past (sleaze, secret meetings, aliminium tariffs, geoff robinson MP scandel etc...) to have an influence in our and our childrens future. He is part of the unelected camp and should be removed. Gordon Brown was never elected to govern and should call an election immediately!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
